mapper.insert: insert into Comment(content, postIdx, userIdx, parentCommentIdx) values(#{content}, #{postIdx}, #{userIdx}, #{parentCommentIdx});
mapper.select: select c.commentIdx, c.content, c.parentCommentIdx, ui.userIdx, ui.profileImage, c.createdAt as date from Comment c join UserInfo ui on c.userIdx = ui.userIdx where c.status = 'Y' and c.parentCommentIdx = 0 and c.postIdx = #{postIdx}

select c.commentIdx, c.content, c.parentCommentIdx, ui.userIdx, ui.profileImage, c.createdAt as date from Comment c join UserInfo ui on c.userIdx = ui.userIdx where c.status = 'Y' and c.parentCommentIdx = #{commentIdx}
